payload.name: os-scheduler-cgroups-are-the-last-line-of-single-host-isolation
payload.title: OS scheduler + cgroups are the last line of single-host isolation
payload.formal: kernel primitives enforce CPU/mem/IO quotas; without them, “policy” is advisory.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2’s policy engine must compile down to kernel-enforced constraints for high-risk executors: cgroups, namespaces, seccomp. The “policy said no network” is meaningless if the process can still open sockets.
